Posts.Content: May 3, 2017 11:18PM - edited May 16, 2017 09:45PM by PetRescue I start TC May 8, 2017. I am scared to death, of course. I am currently, mainly, trying to process the impending hair loss. I tried on wigs but think i will go the scarf and hat route. My port goes in day after tomorrow but I'm not really concerned about it. Trying to keep moving forward
